about_the_game:
Survival On Snow is a wild survival game where you play as Hayan, a survivor of a crashed aircraft in the snow.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LRSstJxRjVzhbRcN2E2HDZof_9ku1Lcl/view?usp=share_link
It's Lobby Scene

The game's strengths include survival in the snow, beautiful 2D visuals like a storybook, encounters with various wild animals, and crafting items and building structures.

Details are below.

◇ Survival on the snow is the core of this game. You will have to contend with various threats such as cold, hunger and wild animals. Make and execute various strategies for survival.

◇ This game consists of beautiful 2D visuals like a storybook. The graphic depicting the beautiful natural scenery of the snowfield further enhances the atmosphere of the game with a pictorial expression of snow and ice.

◇ You can experience encounters with wild animals. Encounters with various wild animals will create a new story.

◇ After collecting various wild materials, you can craft items or structures with the Survival App. This allows you to create your own unique survival strategy.

Come up with a strategy to survive in Survival In Snow with these various advantages!

If you find a bug or want to sign a contract with our company, please send an email to nekokingofficial@gmail.com

short_description: You play as Hayan, a survivor who crashes into a snowy field due to the breakdown of the aircraft, she was on during his journey. To return home, Hayan needs to use his smartphone to gather various wild materials to create items or structures.
supported_languages: English, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Danish, Polish, Russian, Turkish, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian
